summary: My second mod. Improved a bit
descriptionHtml:
I made some changes to my previous thief companion, wich exists no more.

This is a companion, a young nord female named Vylla, wich you can find in the Thieves Guild mainhall, in the cistern. I have not yet bound her to a quest, but that is under development. And since I\'m new to modding, it\'ll probably take some time.
She is set to essential and is classed as a combat rogue, wich means she has high skills in sneak, marksman ect.
I do not understand why she autoequips an imperial bow, when she is equipped with an ebony. 

I tried to make her as young as possible, to look around 17-18ish. I scaled her down some inches to. No facemodyfiermod is used. Its plainly vanillafaces.

Im using:
Body - CBBE: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=2666
Armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13646/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=13646
Graphics: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=15105
And for the hair on my main char Im using: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=10168
Endores to these mods, since I luvvem!.

I think this should work without trouble and such.
If not, please comment :)
author: Wylda
